ukulib.position.desc: Click somewhere on the screen to change the element's position.
ukulib.position.desc.move: Press the §earrow keys§r to precisely adjust the element's position.
ukulib.option.invalid:
Some of the values entered in the config are invalid: %s.
You can still exit by pressing ESC, but the config won't be saved.
ukulib.config.title: Ukulib Config
